question: Which city will host the 2017 Whatashort Independent International Film Festival (WIIFF)?
explanation: The 3rd edition of Whatashort Independent International Film Festival (WIIFF) will be held at the Instituto Cervantes in New Delhi from July 8-9, 2017 to promote short films from across the globe. The significance of the festival lies in the very core idea of uplifting the indie and short film makers and their creations.
